text: it was meant to be a fun school trip to
a holiday island instead it ended here
with a distress call 15 miles off the
south korean coast balanced on the
sinking ho rescuers pulled the teenagers
from cabin windows their classmates left
to wait their turn jumped into the water
as the ship went down before long this
was all that remained above the sea some
passengers have already been confirmed
dead some picked up by rescue boat and
taken to a nearby island have begun
telling their stories hope there was an
announcement telling us to sit still but
the ferry was already sinking some of
the students were not able to escape I
felt like my heart stopped I can't
describe the feeling with one word I was
too shocked but many are still
unaccounted for missing somewhere
between the shipwreck and the shore Navy
Coast Guard and commercial boats have
all joined the search but trying to
track who has been rescued and by whom
isn't easy and with so many of those
onboard still unaccounted for the
demands of their parents and others here
on shore are growing increasingly
desperate
Lucy Williamson BBC news so
